text: 13:6 Dɨboboniba 33:54Ia uaghan, Saidonɨn gumazamizir Lebanonɨn Mɨghsɨabar ikia ghua Misrefot Maimɨn nguibamɨn itiba, ia men nguaziba inizir puvatɨ. Kɨ uabɨ Israelian faragh mangɨ men agɨraghtɨ me aregham, eghtɨ Israelia nguazir kaba inigh dar ikiam. Kɨ nɨ mɨkemezɨ moghɨra, nɨ nguazir kaba bar ada abigh, da isɨ Israelia danightɨ me dar ikɨ.
